intro: Patrinia scabiosifolia f. glabra, commonly known as the smoothleaf Patrinia, is a variant of the Patrinia scabiosifolia species. It is a perennial herb native to China, characterized by its smooth, hairless leaves. The plant typically grows to a height of about 30–60 cm and features opposite, lance-shaped leaves. Its small, white flowers are clustered in dense, rounded inflorescences, blooming in late spring to early summer. This variety is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
